transportation-p: Al-Madar Al-Shamel Company clears your goods from all ports of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia quickly and easily. The discussion begins with the customs work team. All you have to do is prepare the following documents: purchase invoice, Certificate of Origin, Shipping Policy, Insurance policy, Payment voucher, In the event that your goods, the diagram, the diagram, the diagram, and the photo are from the Ministry of Commerce exemption
customsClearance-p: We do the whole export process. We put our export experience at your fingertips. We just need you to provide us with the type of goods you want to export and we will handle the whole thing on your behalf.
